itemDisplayName: Simulated intranet for Microsoft 365 Test Lab Guides (v1.0)
description: This template deploys the Simulated intranet for Microsoft 365 Test Lab Guides base configuration that represents a a simplified environment for Microsoft 365 Enterprise scenarios.
summary: Provisions a Windows Server 2016 Active Directory domain controller, an application server running Windows Server 2016, and a client VM running Windows Server 2016 or Windows 10 Pro.
